document_data.mainbody:
Lords Command was a set of enchanted heavy armor that belonged to Lord Francis Tenraw sometime before 1372 DR.
Lords Command possessed the +1 enchantment to the wearers defenses and offered armor resistant to piercing weapons. Additionally, the armors magic improved the owners strength and provided some resistance to magic.
Lords Command was a set of armor commissioned and custom crafted for Lord Francis Tenraw when he was expecting a war that ended up never happening. With no battles to protect the nobleman in, Lords Command became Francis ceremonial garb and served him in this fashion until his death of old age. The lords daughter inherited this piece of armor but eventually solid it to pay for a new library building for her subjects.
By 1372 DR, Lords Command was in stock at the shop of Derval Ironeater in Daggerford.
